summary: "Jeopardy!" is an American TV game show where players get clues as answers and must ask the right questions. Created by Merv Griffin, it first aired in 1964 and has been hosted by Art Fleming, Alex Trebek, and currently Ken Jennings. The show is known for its long run, winning many Emmy Awards, and being one of the longest-running game shows. Players compete to win money by answering general knowledge questions.
title: Jeopardy!
